name: Android System File
summary: Learn about .SBF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The program RSD Lite can be used to "flash" an SBF file to a Motorola DROID 2 or DROID X phone. Generally, users should not manually restore SBF files, since improper use of the files can cause the phone to malfunction.

description: System file used by Google Android devices, such as Motorola DROID 2 and DROID X mobile phones; contains all phone data as it was originally configured from the factory; enables the phone to be set to the original factory settings.
